name: tf-summarize
description: CLI to print the summary of the terraform plan

repo.name: tf-summarize
repo.description: A command-line utility to print the summary of the terraform plan

readme.summary: Excellent documentation with comprehensive installation options and examples, but lacks troubleshooting guidance and detailed configuration documentation.
readme.top_issue: Missing troubleshooting section for common errors (e.g., plan parsing failures, permission issues, or what to do when output is unexpected)

injection_risks.description: The 'tfbinary' variable is set based on an environment variable, which could potentially be tampered with. Additionally, the 'cmdArgs' slice is constructed using user-controlled input (the 'j.fileName' field), which could lead to command injection attacks.
The 'exec.Command' function is used with a variable command name ('tfbinary'), which could potentially be exploited if the environment variable 'TF_BINARY' is set to a malicious value.

critical_findings: Potential command injection vulnerability in the 'parser/binary-parser.go' file
Lack of input validation and error handling
security.summary: The code has some security concerns, including potential command injection vulnerabilities and lack of input validation, but no sensitive secrets were found.

common_complaints: Output formatting issues (tree format too verbose, markdown line breaks, inconsistent ordering)
Missing feature detection (moved changes not detected)
GitHub integration limitations (forked repos, comment length limits)
Lack of detailed change information in summaries
praise_themes: Useful utility for terraform plan summaries
Good for automation and CI/CD workflows
sentiment.summary: Project shows signs of maintenance decline with multiple unresolved issues spanning 2+ years, slow response times, and unaddressed feature requests, though the tool remains functional and valued by users.

communication.summary: The maintainer responses are generally helpful, clear, and patient, creating a welcoming environment for contributors, but sometimes lack technical depth in their explanations.

concerns: No commits in the past 6 months despite the last commit being recent (2026-01-11)
18 open issues with no recent activity or resolution
Zero closed issues in the past 6 months indicating no maintenance work
No merged PRs in the past 6 months showing no active development
No active contributors in the past 6 months
Unknown last release date suggests release process may be stalled
maintenance.summary: tf-summarize appears to be abandoned with no maintenance activity over the past 6 months despite an initial recent commit timestamp.

project_metrics.description: A command-line utility to print the summary of the terraform plan

concerns: Docs: Lack of troubleshooting section or common problem solutions
Security: Potential command injection vulnerability in the 'parser/binary-parser.go' file
Security: Lack of input validation and error handling
